channel.title: Mathematics on Everything Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Mathematics on Everything Engineering

item.title: Bouncing Bead - Maths from chaos [0]
item.description: Why Mathematics is truly fascinating, seemingly chaotic behavior once broken down to bits, bytes and variables starts making sense not only helps us to not only predict the future behavior and utilize those predictions to our applications; but the journey of solving a problem provides us with tools for solving the next problem blocking our way. To put it poetically, the real maths is the tools we made along the way.
